name: KLOK (plusup)
description:
KLOK

A clock for your desktop. Change the colors to your liking to match your desktop.

'Z' button makes appear the digital clock.
'X' button to hides the digital clock.
Keyboard arrows to change the colors.

KLOK
Code, design, tests, characters, music and sound effects by Murilo Soares.

www.plusup.com.br
